channel.title: Bandos Godsword
channel.description:
Okay well at first I just came looking through here to see what new RS models people were coming up with and I found that a lot of people were just making stuff in general, not necessarily for an RSPS, so I thought I would post something.
So here is a BGS I made a while back:
[img]http://img28.imageshack.us/img28/7771/bandosgodsword.png[/img]
What do you guys think?

item.title: Bandos Godsword

item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I didn’t mean you actually did spline modeling. Just saying that’s what it looks like. Make it more curved… like

Of course not as thick, though.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Godsword
item.dc:creator: @talontantalize talontantalize
item.description:
@talontantalize wrote:

yes there are many unneeded faces on the main part of the handle because I used basics for this and just didn’t change the amount of vertices of the original shape. so thats why there are so many faces on the handle.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Godsword
item.dc:creator: @ravens ravens
item.description:
@ravens wrote:

i meant the blade… and bandos symbol
very few faces on those

EDIT: upon further examination, i realized the hand and hilt are extremely disproportionate to the blade, scale it up by 3

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Godsword
item.dc:creator: @talontantalize talontantalize
item.description:
@talontantalize wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:7, topic:420282”]I could tell by looking at it, that it wasn’t flat…Also <3 for using blender although I would prefer a better more original idea if you want to make a sword.

Either way 8/10[/quote]
I have actually made a lot of stuff, including many weapons and thus, a few swords, I just posted this specifically because it was actually related to RS.

For everyone else, The handle has it’s specific thickness because I didn’t want to make it look chunky. The middle of the blade and the handle are both at the edge of the hilt, so obviously I can’t make them any bigger because they would be sticking out of the hilt.

Also, this is not a 2D drawing extrude >:/ I spent hours making this thing from scratch (even the bindings on the handle) and the only texture even on this thing is the color and the scratchy effect on the hilt.

Also, a wireframe without any subdivisions as requested:

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Godsword
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:11, topic:420282”]Wtf are you talking about, it’s clearly not flat. Anyway, you should make the handle just a bit wider, but besides that nice job.[/quote]There is flat parts rey that I can even see.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @RiiPiiNFtW RiiPiiNFtW

Yea. The blade needs to be raised a bit and the handle needs to be thickened.

item.title: Bandos Godsword
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

Can I have a wireframe that isn’t subdivided? And my main issue is the hilt. Looks too flat. Maybe you need to scale it so it is thicker or add more definition to it. Just looks like you extruded a 2D drawing. I like the render, and the grip is pretty cool. At least if it is real polygons.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Godsword
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Wtf are you talking about, it’s clearly not flat. Anyway, you should make the handle just a bit wider, but besides that nice job.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Godsword
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

[quote=“krackkid, post:9, topic:420282”][quote author=RiiPiiNFtW link=topic=522834.msg3803438#msg3803438 date=1320254949]
May not be all the way flat, but I know it is too flat. And I don’t have an explenation as I am not a modeler, but I can already tell you its too flat.
[/quote]I think what you are talking about are the curved out parts? Extended from the blade right?[/quote]
I have a feeling everyone is saying it’s flat for that reason, but it is kind of lacking thickness. All he has to do it expand the middle a little more and it should look fine, good job.

Read full topic

Either way 8/10

item.title: Bandos Godsword
item.dc:creator: @talontantalize talontantalize
item.description:
@talontantalize wrote:

okay why is everyone saying its flat >.> is it because you can’t see the thickness of the blade or something?? because no one has given any actual explanation for their response yet, you’ve just been repeating each other.

I tried keeping the thickness within a reasonable amount of a real sword Maybe an in-program view with no lighting or anything will help

I also do not take kindly to being accused of tracing after spending hours on this one sword, sir

Read full topic
